title: Lead BI Developer
education: MSc. Data and Information Science (FH Joanneum) — Thesis: Automatic classification of skin cancer using neural networks (with distinction); BA International Marketing & Sales Management (FH Campus 02)
profile_summary: Manuel Wolfsgruber is a BI and data engineering specialist focused on Microsoft Azure ecosystems. He architects scalable lakehouse and data warehouse solutions using Azure Synapse, Databricks and Microsoft Fabric, applies Medallion Architecture and Delta Lake for reliable pipelines, and automates CI/CD with Azure DevOps. He builds PySpark ML pipelines, integrates MLflow for model tracking, and enforces data governance with Unity Catalog. He delivers interactive reporting with Power BI and implements MLOps practices for enterprise and public-sector analytics workloads.

projects_experience.project_title: CEO & Lead BI Developer - Inpro Analytics GmbH
projects_experience.overview: Led development of dynamic automated BI reporting, data platform conception, cloud services and data integration with focus on Power BI and Databricks.
responsibilities: Designed dynamic automated BI reports and visualizations following corporate CI guidelines
Developed data connectors, transformations, and data models for reporting
Implemented cloud data platforms using Azure Synapse, Databricks and Microsoft Fabric
Implemented Delta Lake and Medallion Architecture for dataflow optimization
Built CI/CD pipelines and automated deployments with Azure DevOps
Led trainings on Business Intelligence, databases and Power BI
